rooms.description: Spacious entry with wide door for wheelchair access and Vastu-optimized north entrance.
Open living space featuring Mediterranean style, ample natural lighting and Vastu-friendly east or south orientation for family interactions.
Adjacent to the kitchen with wheelchair access, designed following Mediterranean aesthetics with natural stone finishes.
Quiet study room integrated within living area. Features built-in shelves and wide window placements for ample light, positioned in a Vastu-optimized southeast corner.
Spacious bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. Designed for privacy, natural light and Vastu recommendations.
Cozy secondary bedroom designed to accommodate family members, ensuring adequate space and accessibility if required.
Additional bedroom with natural light optimization and Vastu aligned placement.
Additional bedroom with open plan design for easy movement, incorporating Mediterranean style details.
Smallest bedroom designed for guest use or extra family member, ensuring natural lighting and ease of access.
Fully equipped Mediterranean style kitchen with ample counter space and wheelchair-accessible design including lower countertops.
Luxurious ensuite bathroom designed with accessible features like grab bars and a roll-in shower, ensuring safety and comfort.
Small guest bathroom located conveniently near the entrance, wheelchair-accessible design with ample space for maneuverability.

openings.description: Wide entry door ensuring wheelchair accessibility, with Vastu orientation for positive energy flow.
Large windows placed on east and south walls to maximize natural light while adhering to Mediterranean aesthetics.

openings.location: between living room and garden/outdoor patio
openings.description: Provides seamless connection with outdoor spaces, enhancing natural ventilation and light.
Wheelchair-accessible balcony door offering views of the landscape in a Vastu-positive orientation.

accessibility_features.description: All primary entry points, corridors, and living spaces are designed to be wheelchair accessible.

accessibility_features.feature: Accessible Bathrooms with Roll-in Showers and Grab Bars
accessibility_features.description: Ensures ease of movement and safety for wheelchair users.
